mapper.select: select * from addresses where user_id = #{userId} order by is_default desc, created_at desc
mapper.insert: insert into addresses(user_id, contact_name, contact_phone, address, building, room, is_default, created_at, updated_at) values(#{userId}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{address}, #{building}, #{room}, #{isDefault}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update addresses set contact_name = #{contactName}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone}, address = #{address}, building = #{building}, room = #{room}, is_default = #{isDefault}, updated_at = now() where address_id = #{addressId}
update addresses set is_default = 0 where user_id = #{userId}
update addresses set is_default = 1 where address_id = #{addressId}
